sqlquery.name: SQL_SM_RoleMenuTreeList.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ m.pid pid,l.rolename rolename,r.nodename nodename,r.nodemark nodemark,r.nodeurl nodeurl,l.roledns,l.pid rolepid /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_sm_role l,bs_t_sm_rolemenutree m,bs_t_sm_menutree r where 1=1 and l.pid = m.roleid and r.pid = m.menuid and r.status = '1' $customwhere$ $privilege$ /*ORDERBY*/ order by /*ORDERBY*/ l.roledns
